TF_crush_depth_equipment: increases your safe diving depth by
TF_need_knife_to_break_outcrop: Need a knife to break it
TF_need_knife_to_break_free_resource: Need a knife to break it free
TF_bladderfish_tooltip: Provides some oxygen when consumed raw.
TF_VehicleArmorPlating_install_message: Physical damage will be reduced to 70%
TF_too_much_weight_message: You are carrying too much weight
TF_move_all_items_desc: Hold down this key when taking an item from a container to take all items
TF_move_same_items_desc: Hold down this key when taking an item from a container to take every identical item
TF_previous_PDA_tab_desc: Press this key to open the PDA tab to the left of the current one
TF_next_PDA_tab_desc: Press this key to open the PDA tab to the right of the current one
TF_quick_slot_cycle_desc: Hold down this key and press 'Cycle next' or 'Cycle previous' key to cycle tools in your current quickslot
TF_time_flow_desc: The higher the value the shorter days are. This also affects crafting time, building time, battery charging time
TF_food_loss_mult_desc: Food value you lose when your hunger updates will be multiplied by this
TF_water_loss_mult_desc: Water value you lose when your hunger updates will be multiplied by this
TF_player_damage_mult_desc: Amount of damage player takes will be multiplied by this
TF_vehicle_damage_mult_desc: Amount of damage your vehicles take will be multiplied by this
TF_predator_aggr_mult_desc: The higher it is the more aggressive predators are towards you. When it is 0, you and your vehicles will never be attacked. When it's more than 1 predators attack you from greater distance and more often.
TF_tool_power_mult_desc: Amount of power consumed by your tools will be multiplied by this.
TF_vehicle_power_mult_desc: Amount of power consumed by your vehicles will be multiplied by this.
TF_base_power_mult_desc: Amount of power consumed by your things in your base will be multiplied by this
TF_knife_damage_mult_desc: Applies to knife and thermoblade. You have to reequip your knife after changing this.
TF_med_kit_health_desc: Health restored when using first aid kit
TF_crafting_time_mult_desc: Crafting time will be multiplied by this when crafting things with fabricator or modification station
TF_building_time_mult_desc: Building time will be multiplied by this when using builder tool
TF_cyclops_fire_chance: Cyclops engine room fire chance percent
TF_cyclops_fire_chance_desc: The game starts checking this when you get your first engine overheat warning. After that every 10 seconds chance to catch fire goes up by 10% if you don't slow down.
TF_cyclops_auto_repair_desc: Cyclops auto-repairs when it is not on fire and its HP percent is above this
TF_crush_depth_desc: Depth in meters below which player starts taking crush damage set by 'Crush damage' setting
TF_crush_damage_desc: Player takes this much damage when below crush depth
TF_crush_damage_progression_desc: If this is more than 0, the crush damage you take will be: 'Crush damage' value + 'Crush damage' value * this * number of meters below crush depth
TF_unmanned_vehicles_attack_desc: By default unmanned seamoth or prawn suit can be attacked but cyclops can not.
TF_fish_water_food_value_ratio_desc: Fish's water value will be this percent of its food value if this is more than 0. You have to reload the game after changing this setting.
TF_eating_raw_fish_desc: This changes amount of food you get by eating raw fish. Harmless is a random number between 0 and fish's food value. Risky is a random number between fish's negative food value and fish's food value. Harmful is a random number between fish's negative food value and 0.
TF_can_not_eat_underwater_desc: You will not be able to eat or drink when swimming underwater if this is on
TF_can_not_use_med_kit_underwater: Can not use first aid kit underwater
TF_can_not_use_med_kit_underwater_desc: You will not be able to use first aid kit when swimming underwater if this is on.
TF_fish_speed_mult_desc: Swimming speed of fish that you can catch will be multiplied by this
TF_creature_speed_mult_desc: Swimming speed of creatures that you can not catch will be multiplied by this
TF_creature_flee_chance_percent_desc: Creature's flee chance percent when it is under attack and its flee damage threshold is reached
TF_creature_flee_damage_threshold_desc: Most creatures have damage threshold that has to be reached before they start fleeing. When this setting is off, every creature will flee if it takes any damage.
TF_creature_flee_chance_depends_on_its_h: Creature flee chance depends on its health

Creatures's health will be used to decide if it should flee when under attack. Creature with 90% health has 10% chance to flee. Creature with 10% health has 90% chance to flee. This setting overrides both 'Creature flee chance percent' and 'Damage threshold for fleeing creatures' settings
TF_creatures_in_alien_containment_can_br: Creatures in alien containment can breed
TF_can_not_catch_fish_with_bare_hand: Can not catch fish with bare hands
TF_can_not_catch_fish_with_bare_hand_des: To catch fish you will have to use knife, propulsion cannon, stasis rifle or grav trap. Does not apply if you are inside alien containment
TF_can_not_break_outcrop_with_bare_hand: Can not break outcrop with bare hands
TF_can_not_break_outcrop_with_bare_hand_: You will have to use a knife, repulsion cannon or propulsion cannon to break outcrops or collect resources attached to rock or seabed
TF_player_impact_damage_screen_effects_d: This toggles cracks on your swimming mask when you take damage.
TF_player_damage_screen_effects_desc: This toggles red screen effect when you take damage.
TF_stalker_lose_tooth_chance_percent: Chance percent for stalker to lose its tooth
TF_stalker_lose_tooth_chance_percent_des: Probability percent for stalker to lose its tooth when it bites something hard.
TF_realistic_oxygen_consumption_desc: Default oxygen consumption without rebreather has 3 levels: depth below 200 meters, depth between 200 and 100 meters, depth above 100 meters. With this setting on, your oxygen consumption will increase in linear progression using 'Crush depth' setting. When you are at crush depth it will be equal to default max oxygen consumption and will increase as you dive deeper.
TF_creature_decoy_battery_life_time_desc: Creature decoy stops working after this number of seconds
TF_creature_decoy_hp_desc: Creature decoy will be destroyed after taking this amount of damage if this value is not 0. By default creature decoy HP is infinite
TF_life_pod_power_cell_max_charge: Life pod power cell max charge
TF_life_pod_power_cell_max_charge_desc: Max charge for each of its 3 power cells. You have to reload the game after changing this setting.
TF_crafted_battery_charge_percent_desc: Charge percent of batteries and power cells you craft will be set to this
TF_reload_game: You have to reload the game after changing this setting
TF_inventory_weight_mult_ground_desc: When this is not 0 and you are on the ground you lose 1% of your max speed for every kilo of mass in your inventory multiplied by this
TF_inventory_weight_mult_water_desc: When this is not 0 and you are swimming you lose 1% of your max speed for every kilo of mass in your inventory multiplied by this
TF_prawn_suit_drill_arm_damage_mult: Prawn suit drill arm damage multiplier
TF_food_heal_threshold_desc: Your health regenerates when sum of your food and water values is greater than this
